1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>A Jehová Wilomal, xan c'am majilal ayin.</t>
2: <t>A bay yax ac'un chin yak' xewok, a bay a' aej meleli beyi chin yitok.</t>
3: <t>A Cham chi ak'on wip junjun c'u, chin yitok Cham bay yul-lak be watx', atac'ala' is yalben.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Caxc'al chin eq'uel bay jobelak yelxac'al k'ekk'olinak, man ok in xiw yuj junok tzet yetal ay is may, yujtol ay ach ec' wetok Mamin. Yuj a c'ax c'al a k'okoch tol locan yayji, xan c'am chin xiwi.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Cha watx'nej loj ayin satak eb ajc'ul oc win. Cha ajtok aceite yiban in jolom, cax chak'on noj in vaso yet wuc'a'.</t>
6: <t>A a watx'c'ulalil yetok a camc'ulal ayc'al ec' wetok yak'ban iquis in. Mamin Jehová, ok in ayjok ec' bay atut yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
